blogPost.title: Mounting tensions on the Russia-Ukraine border are driving wheat prices higher on both sides of the Atlantic, leaving traders bracing for more volatility ahead, explains @ahirtens #WSJWhatsNow https://t.co/TZsx7p51bi https://t.co/9A8sUpzqWU
blogPost.author: The Wall Street Journal

localize.full_text: ロシアとウクライナの国境で高まる緊張が、大西洋の両側で小麦の価格を上昇させ、トレーダーは今後のボラティリティに気をもんでいる、と@ahirtensは説明する。 #WSJWhatsNow https://t.co/TZsx7p51bi https://t.co/9A8sUpzqWU
俄乌边境日益紧张的局势正在推动大西洋两岸的小麦价格走高，让交易商为未来更多的波动做好准备，@ahirtens #WSJWhatsNow https://t.co/TZsx7p51bi https://t.co/9A8sUpzqWU 解释道。
俄烏邊境日益緊張的局勢正在推動大西洋兩岸的小麥價格走高，讓交易商爲未來更多的波動做好準備，@ahirtens #WSJWhatsNow https://t.co/TZsx7p51bi https://t.co/9A8sUpzqWU 解釋道。

previous.title: Broadcasters around the world are buying the rights to “Servant of the People,” an old TV show starring Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelensky as the Ukrainian president #WSJWhatsNow https://t.co/KjIVhYDGXU https://t.co/ncRTLkNkX1

localize.full_text: ウクライナ大統領ヴォロディミル・ゼレンスキーが主演した昔のテレビ番組「人民のしもべ」の権利を、世界中の放送局が買い取っている #WSJWhatsNow https://t.co/KjIVhYDGXU https://t.co/ncRTLkNkX1
世界各地的广播公司正在购买 "人民公仆 "的版权，这是一部由乌克兰总统沃洛季米尔-泽伦斯基主演的老牌电视节目#WSJWhatsNow https://t.co/KjIVhYDGXU https://t.co/ncRTLkNkX1
世界各地的廣播公司正在購買 "人民公僕 "的版權，這是一部由烏克蘭總統沃洛季米爾-澤倫斯基主演的老牌電視節目#WSJWhatsNow https://t.co/KjIVhYDGXU https://t.co/ncRTLkNkX1

next.title: Wheat futures are at their highest levels since the global financial crisis, amid Russia’s war in Ukraine #WSJWhatsNow https://t.co/7DRg459mPi https://t.co/NCg8YghicW

localize.full_text: 小麦先物が世界金融危機以来の高値、ロシアのウクライナ戦争で #WSJWhatsNow https://t.co/7DRg459mPi https://t.co/NCg8YghicW
小麦期货处于全球金融危机以来的最高水平，俄罗斯在乌克兰的战争中#WSJWhatsNow https://t.co/7DRg459mPi https://t.co/NCg8YghicW
小麥期貨處於全球金融危機以來的最高水平，俄羅斯在烏克蘭的戰爭中#WSJWhatsNow https://t.co/7DRg459mPi https://t.co/NCg8YghicW
